enumDescriptions.FC_WWN: The Fibre Channel (FC) World Wide Name (WWN).

enumLongDescriptions.EUI: This durable name shall contain the hexadecimal representation of the IEEE-defined 64-bit Extended Unique Identifier (EUI), as defined in the IEEE's Guidelines for 64-bit Global Identifier (EUI-64) Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.FC_WWN: This durable name shall contain a hexadecimal representation of the World-Wide Name (WWN) format, as defined in the T11 Fibre Channel Physical and Signaling Interface Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.NAA: This durable name shall contain a hexadecimal representation of the Name Address Authority structure, as defined in the T11 Fibre Channel - Framing and Signaling - 3 (FC-FS-3) specification.
enumLongDescriptions.UUID: This durable name shall contain the hexadecimal representation of the UUID, as defined in the International Telecom Union's OSI networking and system aspects - Naming, Addressing and Registration Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.iQN: This durable name shall be in the iSCSI Qualified Name (iQN) format, as defined in RFC3720 and RFC3721.

Identifier.description: Any additional identifiers for a Resource.
Identifier.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional identifiers for a Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DurableName.description: The world-wide, persistent name of the Resource.
DurableName.longDescription: This property shall contain the world-wide unique identifier for the Resource.  The string shall be in the Identifier.DurableNameFormat property value format.

DurableNameFormat.description: The format of the durable name property.
DurableNameFormat.longDescription: This property shall represent the format of the DurableName property.

Location.longDescription: This type shall describe the location of a Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Info.longDescription: This property shall represent the location of the Resource.

InfoFormat.description: The format of the Info property.
InfoFormat.longDescription: This property shall represent the Info property format.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Placement.description: A place within the addressed location.
Placement.longDescription: This property shall contain a place within the addressed location.

PostalAddress.description: The postal address of the addressed Resource.
PostalAddress.longDescription: This property shall contain a postal address of the Resource.

Placement.description: The placement within the addressed location.
Placement.longDescription: The value shall describe a location within a Resource.  Examples include a shelf in a rack.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Rack.description: The name of a rack location within a row.
Rack.longDescription: This property shall contain the name of the rack within a row.

RackOffset.description: The vertical location of the item, in terms of RackOffsetUnits.
RackOffset.longDescription: The vertical location of the item in the rack.  Rack offset units shall be measured from bottom to top, starting with 0.

RackOffsetUnits.description: The type of rack units in use.
RackOffsetUnits.longDescription: This property shall contain a RackUnit enumeration literal that indicates the type of rack units in use.

Row.longDescription: This property shall contain the name of the row.

PostalAddress.description: The postal address for a Resource.
PostalAddress.longDescription: Instances shall describe a postal address for a Resource.  For more information, see RFC5139.  Depending on use, the instance may represent a past, current, or future location.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AdditionalCode.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the ADDCODE field.

Building.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the BLD field.  Names the building.

City.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the A3 field.  Names a city, township, or shi (JP).

Community.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the PCN field.  A postal community name.

Country.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the Country field.

District.description: A county, parish, gun (JP), or district (IN).
District.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the A2 field.  Names a county, parish, gun (JP), or district (IN).

Division.description: City division, borough, dity district, ward, or chou (JP).
Division.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the A4 field.  Names a city division, borough, dity district, ward, or chou (JP).

Floor.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the FLR field.  Provides a floor designation.

GPSCoords.description: The GPS coordinates of the part.
GPSCoords.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the ADDCODE field.  Shall contain the GPS coordinates of the location.  If furnished, expressed in the '[-][nn]n.nnnnnn, [-][nn]n.nnnnn' format.  For example, two comma-separated positive or negative numbers with six decimal places of precision.

HouseNumber.description: The numeric portion of house number.
HouseNumber.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the HNO field.  The numeric portion of the house number.

HouseNumberSuffix.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the HNS field.  Provides a suffix to a house number, (F, B, or 1/2).

Landmark.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the LMK field.  Identifies a landmark or vanity address.

LeadingStreetDirection.longDescription: The value shall conform to the requirements of the PRD field as defined in RFC5139.  Names a leading street direction, (N, W, or SE).

Location.description: The room designation or other additional information.
Location.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the LOC field.  Provides additional information.

Name.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the NAM field.  Names the occupant.

Neighborhood.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the A5 field.  Names a neighborhood or block.

POBox.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the POBOX field.  A post office box (PO box).

PlaceType.description: The description of the type of place that is addressed.
PlaceType.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the PLC field.  Examples include office and residence.

PostalCode.description: The postal code or zip code.
PostalCode.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the PC field.  A postal code (or zip code).

Road.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the RD field.  Designates a primary road or street.

RoadBranch.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the RDBR field.  Shall contain a post office box (PO box) road branch.

RoadPostModifier.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the POM field.  For example, Extended.

RoadPreModifier.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the PRM field.  For example, Old or New.

RoadSection.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the RDSEC field.  A road section.

RoadSubBranch.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the RDSUBBR field.

Room.description: The name or number of the room.
Room.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the ROOM field.  A name or number of a room to locate the Resource within the unit.

Seat.description: The seat, such as the desk, cubicle, or workstation.
Seat.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the SEAT field.  A name or number of a seat, such as the desk, cubicle, or workstation.

Street.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the A6 field.  Names a street.

StreetSuffix.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the STS field.  Names a street suffix.

Territory.description: A top-level subdivision within a country.
Territory.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the A1 field when it names a territory, state, region, province, or prefecture within a country.

TrailingStreetSuffix.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the POD field.  Names a trailing street suffix.

Unit.description: The name or number of the apartment unit or suite.
Unit.longDescription: The value shall conform to the RFC5139-defined requirements of the UNIT field.  The name or number of a unit, such as the apartment or suite, to locate the Resource.

RackUnits.description: The type of rack unit in use.

enumDescriptions.EIA_310: A rack unit that is equal to 1.75 in (44.45 mm).
enumDescriptions.OpenU: A rack unit that is equal to 48 mm (1.89 in).

enumLongDescriptions.EIA_310: Rack units shall conform to the EIA-310 standard.
enumLongDescriptions.OpenU: Rack units shall be specified in terms of the Open Compute Open Rack specification.

RackUnits.longDescription: Enumeration literals shall name the type of rack unit in use.

ReferenceableMember.description: The base type for addressable members of an array.
ReferenceableMember.longDescription: References array members by using the value returned in the @odata.id property, which may be a dereferenceable URL.  The @odata.id of this entity shall contain the location of this element within an item.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MemberId.description: The identifier for the member within the collection.
MemberId.longDescription: This property shall uniquely identify the member within the collection.  For services supporting Redfish v1.6 or higher, this value shall contain the zero-based array index.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Resource.description: The base type for Resources and members that can be linked to.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

title: #Resource.v1_4_6
